groups.name: Content priority
groups.description: Indicate how urgent and important the creation of this content is.

options.name: Important and urgent
options.description: Do this now.

options.name: Important, but not urgent
options.description: Schedule a time to do this.

options.name: Not important, but urgent
options.description: Can you outsource this?

options.name: Not important and not urgent
options.description: Eliminate this.

groups.name: Content progress
groups.description: Status indicator for the current development stage of this page.

options.name: Accepted
options.description: The seed is planted, but the page is still empty.

options.name: In progress
options.description: Work has begun and leafs are starting to appear.

options.name: Ready for review
options.description: About to be transplanted into the open field.

options.name: Done
options.description: Watered, fertilized and steadily growing under the sun.

groups.name: Content health
groups.description: Status indicator for the current condition of this page.

options.name: Fruiting
options.description: This particular page is performing really well.

options.name: Healthy
options.description: Everything in balance here. Things look lush and green.

options.name: Plagued
options.description: Somehow, this page is attracting more bugs than visitors.

options.name: Wilting
options.description: The content is outdated or has outlived its purpose entirely.

groups.name: Content improvements
groups.description: Tags to indicate how the content could be improved.

options.name: Text
options.description: Content needs more structure or some trimming.

options.name: Graphics
options.description: It lacks visual balance or needs (more) supportive imagery.

options.name: Information
options.description: Incorrect data or not sending out the right message.

options.name: Interaction
options.description: Usability or response could be better.

options.name: Layout
options.description: The elements are not optimally positioned yet.

options.name: Overviews
options.description: Content loaded from other places still needs some tweaking.

options.name: SEO
options.description: The content needs (better) optimization for search engines.

options.name: Performance
options.description: The page is taking too long to load.

options.name: Accessibility
options.description: There are obstacles for visitors with disabilities.

groups.name: Content issues
groups.description: Tags to indicate what kind of problem the user is facing.

options.name: Manager
options.description: I'm having issues (or lost the way) while navigating MODX.

options.name: Content
options.description: I'm having difficulties adding or editing content.

options.name: Styling
options.description: Things don't look as they should on the website.

options.name: Technical
options.description: The output on the site is incorrect, or there's no output at all.

options.name: Functional
options.description: I hit a limitation or inconsistency in one of the components.

options.name: Conceptual
options.description: I'm not happy with this content and would like to hear your opinion.

groups.name: Improvement priority
groups.description: Indicate how urgent and important this improvement currently is.

options.name: Important and urgent
options.description: Let's do this now.

options.name: Important, but not urgent
options.description: Let's schedule this in.

options.name: Not important, but urgent
options.description: Can we source this out?

options.name: Not important and not urgent
options.description: Nice to have. Someday.

groups.name: Issue priority
groups.description: Indicate how urgent and important this issue currently is.

options.name: Important and urgent
options.description: This is a major roadblock right now.

options.name: Important, but not urgent
options.description: It can wait, but needs your full attention.

options.name: Not important, but urgent
options.description: A quick fix or dirty workaround will do.

options.name: Not important and not urgent
options.description: Are you sure this is a problem?
